## Alif Ailan 2016 Data



```{r cars}

alif<-read.csv("Alifailan.csv",header = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)

alif<-alif %>% filter(Province!="AJK",Province!="GB",Province!="ICT",Province!="FATA")


```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
p<-ggplot(alif,aes(x=Drinking.water,y=Toilet,color=Province))+geom_point()
p
p+facet_wrap(~Province,ncol = 4)+
  labs(x="Drinking Water",y="Toilet Facility",title = "Toilet facility and Drinking Water Facility situation province wise",
       caption = "Alif Ailan Data 2016")
```
